mapper.sql: A.SL_CODE AS slCode ,A.SL_PD_ID AS slPdId ,A.PROD_EP_ID AS prodEpId ,A.BRAND_EP_ID AS brandEpId ,A.BRAND_ID AS brandId ,A.PD_CLASSES_CODE AS pdClassesCode ,A.PD_BREED_CODE AS pdBreedCode ,A.PD_FEATURE_CODE AS pdFeatureCode ,A.DIST_FLG AS distFlg ,A.SL_TNC_GRADE_CODE AS slTncGradeCode ,A.SL_QLT_GRADE_CODE AS slQltGradeCode ,A.DEL_FLG AS delFlg
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sl_product A WHERE A.SL_CODE=#{slCode}
